title: 376. Q&AF: Overcoming Getting Shot In The Face, Piss-Stained Mattress Phase & Remote Work Causing Depression
itunes:title: 376. Q&AF: Overcoming Getting Shot In The Face, Piss-Stained Mattress Phase & Remote Work Causing Depression
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to overcome a traumatic moment in your life that resulted in a noticeable scar on your forehead, what advice Andy would have given himself when he was going through the piss-stained mattress phase of building his business, and the best way to overcome the depression experienced by many of us these past few years due to virtual interactions.
